text: Allahvin mitum, avanutaiya tutar mitum iman kontavarkale! (Unmai) muhminkalavarkal, melum, avarkal oru potuvana kariyam parri avarutan (alocikkak kuti) irukkum potu avarutaiya anumatiyinri (ankiruntu) cellamattarkal; (napiye!) Um'mitattil (avvaru) anumati perruc celpavarkale niccayamaka allahvin mitum avan tutar mitum meyyakave iman kontavarkal, akave tankal kariyankal cilavarrukkaka avarkal um'mitam anumati kettal, avarkalil nir virumpiyavarukku anumati kotuppiraka innum avarkalukkaka allahvitam nir mannippuk koruviraka niccayamaka allah mikka mannippavan; kirupaiyutaiyavan
